NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Medical equipments, pharmaceuticals and personal care products

CODIF_DATA.PR_PROC: Negotiated without a prior call for competition
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 08B15

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Calderdale and Huddersfield Solutions Ltd, acting on behalf of Calderdale and Huddersfield NHS Foundation Trust

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Calderdale and Huddersfield Solutions Ltd, acting on behalf of Calderdale and Huddersfield NHS Foundation Trust
ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Huddersfield Royal Infirmary, CHS Headquarters, Procurement Department, Acre Street

SHORT_DESCR.P: The provision of type IIR masks. Type IIR masks were required to effectively implement Covid-19 related PPE measures.
Award of a contract for the short term provision of level 2 and level 3 fluid resistant gowns. The award was made via a negotiation without prior publication of a contract notice

INFO_ADD.P: The requirement to use such PEE was issued as part of series of government policies. The authority was required to immediately implement these policies in an effort to prevent and control the spread of Covid-19.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: The Covid-19 pandemic resulted in an requirement for the authority to take immediate action to control the spread of Covid-19. A delay in the procurement would have result in a risk of staff and patients contracting and spreading Covid-19.
The authority's conclusion is that a lawful state of extreme urgency was duly sustained.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Calderdale and Huddersfield Solutions Ltd, Acting on behalf of Calderdale and Huddersfield NHS Foundation Trust
ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.ADDRESS: Huddersfield Royal Infirmary, CHS Headquarters, Acre Street
